video.title: La Fea más Bella
video.synopsis: Bright but plain-looking Lety gets a job at a fashion company run by a womanizing CEO. Will she finally get the recognition she deserves?

episodes.synopsis: Alicia and Lety apply for executive secretary positions at the Conceptos agency. Lopez is inclined to hire Alicia instead of Lety, who is ugly.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Fernando describes Lety's appearance to Omar and they laugh at her. Fernando tells Marcia Lety is better qualified for the job than Alicia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Fernando welcomes Lety and Alicia to the agency. Lety is excited, she thinks Fernando thinks she's cute. Lola gets Adrianita and Cuco into the office.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Fernando makes Simon apologize for bothering Lety. Lety gets in trouble at work for leaving Fernando's personal planner out on the desk.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Lopez orders Lety to let Alicia have the office. Fernando gets very angry with Marcia for what she did to Lety, and threatens to fire Lopez.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Lety is sad to find out she's been stood up by Roman. Simon apologizes to Lety for the hazing he put her through.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Alicia asks Marcia to help make sure Lety doesn't show her up in front of the executives. Lety proves her organizational skills to Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: The secretaries tell Lety Fernando is a Don Juan and warn her not to fall in love with him. Ariel finds flaws in Fernando's proposal for Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Alicia to do a special job for him. Alicia asks Omar for help. Lety's rivalry with the other secretary puts her job in danger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Alicia fails to finish a job for Fernando. Omar refuses to help Alicia prepare the business plan. Don Erasmo arrives at Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks for Lety's resignation, but she talks with Omar,  and tells the secretaries she was fired.  Lola demands she be given her severance pay.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Lety to attend his meeting with Ariel, and Ariel makes fun of her. Don Erasmo is furious when he finds out Lety is a secretary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Lety interrupts Fernando while he's giving instructions to Lopez and Luigi. Alicia asks Marcia to get her a date with Ariel to make Omar jealous.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Fernando spends the night with Marcia. Don Erasmo reprimands Lety for going out without permission. Lety has a great time with Julieta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: With Paula Maria's help, Lety makes Simon take her to the club. Lety interrupts Fernando before a jump at his riding contest.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Marcia about how Lety was humiliated at the club. Marcia is mad at Fernando for giving Lety a promotion.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Olarte tells Ariel Fernando can cook the books for the board meeting. Alicia isn't happy with Ariel's insinuations.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Ortiz tells Olarte Lety blocked access to the files. The girl who was going to film the commercial gets sick; Lola offers Adrianita for the job.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Ortiz tells the board he can't repair Lety's computer until the following day. Ariel reprimands Lety for not backing up the files.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: At the board meeting, Fernando removes Alicia to give Lety a place at the table. Fernando asks Lety to addresss the issues with the ledger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Ariel tells Fernando he's not part of the conspiracy. The board puts Lety in charge of finances. Ariel lets Alice know who blocked Lety's computer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Ariel asks Alicia to tell him everything that happens at Conceptos. Fernando asks Lety to supervise the video camera purchase.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Luigi to use a video camera instead of film, but he refuses. Marcia is mad at Fernando for authorizing Lety's signature for the bank.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Alicia won't go out with Omar. Lety convinces Fernando to go with Cine-Rent. Ariel joins Alicia's department. Omar offers to take Paula Maria home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Alicia overhears Fernando tell Marcia they're going to sign a contract with Cine-Rent, and she tells Ariel. Fernando tells Miguel Lety convinced him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Don Erasmo about her promotion, but he reprimands her and convinces her not to accept it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Carolina criticizes Fernando and Omar for making fun of Lety for her appearance. Luigi finds dinosaurs drawn onto his sketches.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Fernando supervises Beni's reception. Marcia tells Fernando Fabiola and Gregorio are having trouble with the clients and have stopped production.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Fernando angers Luigi giving him a video camera instead of the 35-mm he asked for. The Ugly Club celebrates Lety's promotion to president.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Carolina tells Fernando about the agreement she made with the press. The secretaries from the Ugly Club are upset about Luigi and Rolando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Lola reproaches Efren for not taking care of his children. Fernando takes Luigi's bet. Don Erasmo and Julieta go out to pick up a drunken Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Lety authorizes Cuco, Adrianita, Jaimito, and Clarita to stay with Conceptos. The kids find some posters and decide to make a collage.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Fernando why she didn't hire the models. Fernando reprimands Lety for letting the kids stay at the company. Fernando asks Luigi to return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Fernando comes to an agreement with the models and Luigi about hiring them. Fatima comes looking for Fernando, and Omar says he should seduce her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Simon arrives at the bar to see Paula Maria and pawns his watch to pay the bill. Simon shows Paula Maria how much he cares for her, and they kiss.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Fernando convinces Lety to back Filmo Imagen with Conceptos. Marcia arrives at Conceptos and Alicia complains about how she was treated at the club.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Yazmin tries to convince Efren to let her work for Conceptos. Marcia reminds Alicia about her loan. Lola tells Efren to let Yazmin work for Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Luigi shows his commercial to the clients. Alicia laughs at the club girls for their shyness. Fernando refuses to show Ariel the ledger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Lola offers to help Simon economically to get Yazmin to fall for him. Lety tells Fernando they won't reach their goal even with the big contract.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Fernando agrees to cross-dress. Yazmin agrees to go out to eat with Simon. Martha tells Efren over the phone where Yazmin and her lover will be.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Alicia asks Omar to get back together with her. Fernando agrees to pay the Panama supplier in advance, but Lety doesn't think it's a good idea.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks for Lety's help. Fernando has a fit and gets arrested for causing a public disturbance. Lety comes back to clear up the situation.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Fernando explains to Marcia why he went to Lety for help and not her. Fernando tells Marcia he's going to New York to close a deal with a supplier.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Yazmin and the kids tell the club girls about Simon's crash, and they all refuse to help him. Lety tells Fernando Marcia demands to speak with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Simon the restaurant employee was fired for the car crash. Varela tells Omar their shipment was confiscated by Customs as contraband.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is angry at Lety for letting Don Erasmo know about Filmo Imagen. Alicia tells Ariel what Marcia told her about the New York suppliers.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: As a gift, Martha receives a check for her to buy a car. Marcia tells Fernando Alicia really is pregnant. Ariel interrogates her about it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Fernando Bella Life and the ad agency want them to launch their campaign. The club girls convince Martha to get liposuction.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Omar tells Fernando he's been recommended a lawyer for the Conceptos embargo. Omar gives Alicia a check to help raise her baby.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Fernando hides Conceptos's economic situation from Marcia. Mr. Sanchez increases his fees. Yazmin thanks Simon for his support and flirts with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Martha tells Fernando she's on a diet. The club girls ask Lola to change her attitude toward Efren, and to his surprise, she does.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: The club girls hear Alicia say she had a blood test. Martha, in Alicia's name, asks the lab to test for pregnancy as well and send Martha the results.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Lety asks Mr. Sanchez to be discreet when the embargo is lifted. At the rehearsal for the commercial Fatima flirts with Fernando and Marcia is mad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: When Fernando asks Luigi to fire Fatima, he refuses. Martha answers Lety's phone and tells her, in front of Fernando, that it's her boyfriend, Tomas.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Fernando questions Lety's honesty. The club girls go on a diet in solidarity with Martha, but a waiter tells them she's eating like crazy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Irmita tells Fernando Fatima is drinking and asking for him. Fernando tells Marcia Luigi fired Fatima. He asks Yazmin to take Fatima's place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Omar convinces Fernando to let the club girls in. Paco and the guard lets him, Jaimito, and Clarita in. Fernando denies access to Marcia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Simon convinces Yazmin to go out to dinner. She tells Efren she's going to go out with the dancers. Paula Maria convinces Simon to go with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Alicia makes fun of Paula Maria because she showed up wearing the same clothes as the day before and smells like the same soap Simon uses.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Omar suggests Fernando drink a healthy amount of whiskey to make Lety look better to him. Simon's poverty gives Paula Maria second thoughts about him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo Montaner takes the stage and everyone applauds. Mr. Sanchez tells Tomas he should continue the embargo on Conceptos, but he refuses.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Omar Lety doesn't love Tomas. Simon tells Paula Maria he wants to make their relationship official, but she refuses.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Marcia asks Lola to explain why Juanita fired them. Marcia offers a loan to Lola to pay for Yazmin's cell phone, and she suggests she get a divorce.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Omar ignores Alicia's attempts to seduce him. Lety isn't happy about Omar inviting Fernando to go out with the models.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Omar makes fun of Fernando because he kissed Lety on two different occasions. He says he convinced her he loved her, but she just ignores him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Fernando the club girls told Alicia Tomas was her boyfriend. Ariel offers to set Alicia up with someone, and she's offended by the offer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: The club girls tell Simon he shouldn't be too insistent with Paula Maria. Omar rejects Alicia. Fernando leaves Lety behind at a nightclub.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Lety and Fernando almost get caught by Paula Maria kissing at a nightclub. Tomas gets very drunk. Simon catches Paula Maria with someone else.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Martha tells Lety she suspects Fernando has a lover. Simon treats Paula Maria with indifference.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Alicia Lety should know who Fernando's lover is. Omar makes fun of Fernando because Lety doesn't want to be with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Alicia hides Omar's keys in her bra. When he can't find them, she offers to drive him, but he refuses and leaves with a model. She throws his keys.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Fernando if anyone wants to tear them apart she's not going to make it easy. Lety decides she doesn't want to be Ugly Lety anymore.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Lola and Martha he can't do anything for Paula Maria. Simon takes everyone to Reception to see Paula Maria, who's crying over Jaimito.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo congratulates Conceptos for their work. Luigi presents his new commercial for Bella Life. Yazmin is worried when Efren won't answer the phone.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Tomas, pretending to be an executive, tells Alicia he's the manager of Filmo Imagen. Fernando keeps a photo of Patricia Manterola in a bikini.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Luigi calls Yazmin out for not doing a good job. Efren shows up at Conceptos in a plaster cast and walking on crutches.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Fernando arrives in the early morning to visit Marcia and prove he doesn't have a lover. Eduardo shows up looking for him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Omar advises Fernando to go out with Lety to celebrate her birthday. Eduardo tells Fernando he heard Lety and realized she loves and respects him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Jose recognizes Eduardo and lets the club girls in. Eduardo asks the mariachi to sing. Marcia reprimands Alicia for flirting with Tomas.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Irmita tells Yazmin Lola and Efren should divide their possessions. Knowing Eduardo has money, Alicia bets Luigi she can conquer him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: Marcia is mad that Fernando is looking for excuses not to go with her. She asks Alicia to accompany her in following Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo demands Tomas pay the cell phone bill, but he refuses. Tomas is surprised by how much it is. Lety is forced to invite Marcia to the party.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Omar and Fernando arrive at a bar, Alicia, in disguise, goes in to spy on them. Tomas and Mr. Sanchez and Mr. Rosales play pool.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Marcia she thinks Fernando went to a brothel. She sends her to investigate. Don Erasmo tells Fernando about Lety's academic achievements.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: Roman and a young man get in Marcia and Alicia's car, and she sprays them with pepper spray. A policeman shows up and takes them all to the station.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Omar over the phone what's going on with Lety. Marcia reprimands Alicia because now they have to go out with Roman and his friends.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Paula Maria talks with Lety about her night with Simon. Yazmin is mad at Efren because he refuses to ask for half of Lola's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Yazmin rejects Efren, accepts Simon's invitation, and turns her cell phone off. Lety chokes on her food when she hears Lola say Marcia questioned her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Alicia refuses to pawn her jewelry and her car. Lety is sad to hear about Fernando and Marcia's wedding from Luigi.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Yazmin is happy to hear Efren will ask for half of Lola's house. Ariel tells Fernando if he doesn't marry Marcia, he'll get the company dissolved.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Fernando says he loves Lety and doesn't want to leave her, and they kiss. Martha tells Paco the liposuction didn't help because now she eats more.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Lety receives a touching card from Fernando. Simon takes Patricia Manterola to meet the Conceptos staff, and Alicia lets Marcia know.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Alicia advises Marcia to go after Patricia Manterola. Omar tells Fernando Lety left the president's office in tears.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Marcia is upset when Lety tells Fernando he should talk to the bankers and start the Bella Life commercial. Omar tells Fernando he should seduce Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Marcia is upset because Alicia asks her to go look for Fernando. Omar offers to let Fernando take Lety to his apartment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Roman and his friends catch Alicia and demand an explanation for her lies. Lety reminds Fernando about Miguel's arrival and Roman's bet.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Alicia she doesn't want to travel with Fernando so she can get away from him for a while. Fernando doesn't want to keep leading Lety on.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: Fernando won't let Lety go and asks her never to say she's leaving him again, and they kiss. Luigi offends the club girls, and Cristina is mad at him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Fernando gives Lety a present and a card he wrote, saying he wants her to forget the past and have faith again. Marcia invites Lety to eat.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Simon takes the kids and when Efren confronts Lola, she makes him see that Paco and Simon have acted more like fathers to them than he has.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Celso lets it slip to the club girls that there was a fight with Fernando. Alicia hears this and thinks he was fighting to defend her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Omar tells Fernando he'll have to find the red bag because if it falls into the wrong hands, what he did to save the company will get out.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Fernando answers Marcia's phone, and she gets upset, thinking it's Lety. Marcia tells Fernando she doesn't want to lose him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Alicia interrogates the club girls and blames Juanita for taking the bag. When she tries to kiss him, Tomas tells Matilde he's going to marry Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: Luigi informs Fernando he's rushing off to Germany to film the Sport Wing commercial. Fernando gives Lety a drawing he made.
episodes.title: Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: Fernando leaves his car in the middle of the street and goes looking for Lety. Raul and Simon hold a casting call for models for the commercial shoot.
episodes.title: Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Marcia she thinks Fernando is making pornographic films. Marcia asks him about it and he denies it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Efren comes looking for Yazmin. Paula Maria manages to get Pilar Zacarias, a model Luigi had been wanting to work with, to come to Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: The club girls make fun of Alicia for saying she knows how to ride horses. They deny the banquet budget Martha presents to them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo hangs up on Matilde. Alicia and Pilar bump into each other at the supermarket. Pilar spies on Lety and Fernando discussing their cooking.
episodes.title: Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Julieta tells Matilde she's Don Erasmo's wife. She goes looking for Tomas. Fernando tells Lety he feels good with her, and answers a call from Marcia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Alicia complains to Marcia that Fernando won't give her the chance to shoot the commercial and earn the money she needs to pay her debt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Pilar says she doesn't want to film on a horse because she's scared of them. Don Riquelme teaches Don Erasmo to play golf, but his ball hits Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: Gerardo tells Fernando they'll have trouble with the color of the clothes being modeled. Ricardo reaches the location and introduces the client.
episodes.title: Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo meets with Mr. Riquelme. Fernando, Ricardo, and Gerardo follow Luigi's instructions. Alicia spies on Pilar, and Tomas spies on her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 115

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo reprimands Lety for letting people hug her. He asks Fernando to help look after her, because it looks like she's picked up bad habits.
episodes.title: Capítulo 116

episodes.synopsis: Pilar tells a friend by phone that Fernando agreed to be Pavel, but she could tell he didn't want to. Pilar tells Lety what Fernando confessed to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 117

episodes.synopsis: Lety tries to make Don Erasmo understand why Sara and Fernando put on their charade. Fernando tells Julieta how the club helped him get the ad done.
episodes.title: Capítulo 118

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Alicia he knows that she's trying to figure out what he's talking about with Ricardo and Lety, and removes her from his office.
episodes.title: Capítulo 119

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Lety stay at a hotel in Germany. They are informed the client has already signed a contract with another advertising agency.
episodes.title: Capítulo 120

episodes.synopsis: Marcia recognizes the voices of Tono de Valdez and Omar Chaparro, and Fernando says they're in Germany at the club. They get tickets to the game.
episodes.title: Capítulo 121

episodes.synopsis: In Munich, Fernando and Lety talk about what a great time they've been having. Lety apologizes to Don Humberto for not sending him the video.
episodes.title: Capítulo 122

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Omar how nervous Lety got during post-production. He recommends he watch Lety's DVD. Lety asks Simon to send an envelope to London.
episodes.title: Capítulo 123

episodes.synopsis: Alicia complains to Ruben about the club girls going to the Solo Para Mujeres show, and he recommends that she go with them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 124

episodes.synopsis: Efren introduces Yazmin to Cuco and Adrianita. She blames Lola for making them hate her. Efren asks her to try to get along with the kids.
episodes.title: Capítulo 125

episodes.synopsis: Alicia manages to get into the Solo Para Mujeres show. Simon, dressed as a woman, is forced to go on-stage. The kids make a mess at Efren's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 126

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo invites Mr. Sanchez and Mr. Rosales to have a drink. Fernando doesn't answer Marcia's phone, and Lety is worried.
episodes.title: Capítulo 127

episodes.synopsis: At the restaurant, Fernando asks for a more private table, and Lety thinks he doesn't want to be seen with her. Julieta prays for Lety's protection.
episodes.title: Capítulo 128

episodes.synopsis: Marcia asks Omar to help her get Fernando back. Fernando and Lety hear Ariel leave the hotel. Omar tells Marcia Fernando isn't seeing anyone else.
episodes.title: Capítulo 129

episodes.synopsis: Jorge Flores tells Lety he's a psychic, and the issues she's having with Fernando are caused by another woman. He tells her about a yellow envelope.
episodes.title: Capítulo 130

episodes.synopsis: Carolina notices Lety's been crying, but she says it's just a cold. Fernando hands Simon the video for Don Humberto and Teresita.
episodes.title: Capítulo 131

episodes.synopsis: Lety won't let Fernando take her home, and decides she hates him. Cuco and Adrianita clean up the house as thanks for what Lola has done for them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 132

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo argues with his neighbors thinking they have the dog that won't let him sleep. Lety tells Tomas how she uncovered the plot.
episodes.title: Capítulo 133

episodes.synopsis: At the office, Lety kicks Fernando's photo. Carolina talks to Lety about what she'll do with her lover's gifts and suggests she talk with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 134

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Rocio Orozco Alicia has borrowed a lot of money, but she never pays it back. Lety reads a letter from Omar to Fernando about her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 135

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tries to kiss Lety, but she doesn't let him, claiming it's because Celso is around. Fernando introduces Lety as his assistant at Yuri's show.
episodes.title: Capítulo 136

episodes.synopsis: Fernando denies being in love with Lety and leaves. Tomas and Alicia trip, and she insults him. Lety refuses to go see Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 137

episodes.synopsis: Simon is mad at Paula Maria and Lola for leaving the party. Anais tells Tomas Lety is looking for him. Fernando is sad to see Lety leave with Tomas.
episodes.title: Capítulo 138

episodes.synopsis: Lety is sad to hear Fernando tell Omar he's not jealous of Tomas. Lety tells Tomas that just to be safe, she made Fernando sign a new IOU.
episodes.title: Capítulo 139

episodes.synopsis: Alicia convinces Tomas to go on a date with her and they keep it secret from Lety. Alicia and Martha fight over a chocolate, and Martha passes out.
episodes.title: Capítulo 140

episodes.synopsis: Lety reproaches Tomas for flirting with Yazmin and asks him to be faithful as her boyfriend in front of the club girls. Fernando sees them together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 141

episodes.synopsis: Simon pays Alicia's taxi driver so he'll move and let Lety park. Fernando and Marcia are surprised to see Lety's car. Tomas buys formal clothes.
episodes.title: Capítulo 142

episodes.synopsis: The club girls get nervous because Lety can't drive. At the restaurant, the club girls tell Fernando Lety invited them and her boyfriend's paying.
episodes.title: Capítulo 143

episodes.synopsis: Luigi is surprised when Celso tells him Lety's boyfriend loaned her his car. Fernando tells Omar he hasn't been with Marcia since he was with Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 144

episodes.synopsis: Fernando makes Lety cancel her plans with the club girls so they can go out. He tells Marcia Tomas is the manager of Filmo Imagen, Incorporated.
episodes.title: Capítulo 145

episodes.synopsis: Jorge Flores tells Fernando Lety will be his downfall instead of helping him, and as long as business is the most important thing to him, he's doomed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 146

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Lety to go somewhere where they could be alone and tries to kiss her, but she rejects him. He cries and says he's dying to be with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 147

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Tomas how hardit was to be around Fernando since all he cares about is the business. Fernando talks to Omar about who saw him with Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 148

episodes.synopsis: In front of Ariel, Alicia tries to get Tomas to ask her out. Marcia tells Ariel where Tomas works. Fernando shows Luciano the Sport Wing commercial.
episodes.title: Capítulo 149

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Omar hear Lety reprimand Tomas for going out with Alicia. Lety asks Tomas for the car. Alicia finds out her car will be auctioned off.
episodes.title: Capítulo 150

episodes.synopsis: Alicia is worried that Tomas is going to leave her for Lety. Luigi threatens to fire Yazmin if she doesn't keep rehearsing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 151

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is furious when he sees Lety kiss Tomás on the cheek after a toast. When they leave arm-in-arm, Fernando follows them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 152

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Tomas she doesn't want him to lend her money. She kisses him, then apologizes for her boldness and pretends to be embarrassed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 153

episodes.synopsis: Lety reads a card from Fernando and throws it away. Alicia pressures Tomas to get her a loan. Luigi tells Yazmin another dancer is replacing her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 154

episodes.synopsis: Luigi won't stop pressuring Irmita and she faints. Lola, Sara, and Martha help her. Carolina catches Fernando kissing Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 155

episodes.synopsis: Fernando finds out Lety is at Irmita's house. Paco takes Martha to the doctor. Everyone shows Irmita their affection for her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 156

episodes.synopsis: Lety reminds Tomas he shouldn't give money to Alicia. Before going in to see Alicia, Tomas hides his checkbook.
episodes.title: Capítulo 157

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Lety after the board meeting he'll tell everyone about them. Irmita tells Rafael he's dead to her. He asks her to forgive him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 158

episodes.synopsis: Rafael tells Irmita about his life. Lety takes the job Carolina offers her. Don Humberto says his wedding gift to Marcia and Fernando will be a house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 159

episodes.synopsis: Fernando demands Lety cook the books, to the point of begging. He tells her he loves her, they kiss, and she agrees to finish the ledger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 160

episodes.synopsis: Marcia checks Fernando's outgoing cell phone call record and discovers he called Lety at Conceptos. Ariel offers Santiago to Alicia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 161

episodes.synopsis: Lety cooks the books for Fernando, and he thanks her, hugs her, and kisses her. As she's leaving Conceptos, Lety remembers her time there.
episodes.title: Capítulo 162

episodes.synopsis: Irmita refuses to forgive Rafael and kicks him out of her house. Alicia thinks Tomas wants to be with her and invites him to her bedroom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 163

episodes.synopsis: Tomas refuses to answer his phone because he doesn't want to talk to Alicia, which angers her. Lety tells him to forget her like she forgot Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 164

episodes.synopsis: Marcia shows Lety how strongly she doesn't want her in the company. Lety says after the meeting she'll resign and they won't have to see each other.
episodes.title: Capítulo 165

episodes.synopsis: Lety explains the ledger to Don Humberto. Fernando doesn't let her finish. Ariel says Conceptos owes money to Filmo Imagen, and Fernando explains why.
episodes.title: Capítulo 166

episodes.synopsis: Lety says goodbye to the club girls and is about to leave when Marcia demands to see what she's taking. Lety shows her the cards Fernando wrote her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 167

episodes.synopsis: Teresita tells Marcia she shouldn't feel bad because Fernando didn't really love Lety. Fernando tells Omar why Lety ratted on them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 168

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Carolina the wedding is off. Lety hears them and blames herself, both for the cancelled wedding and for the downfall of Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 169

episodes.synopsis: Irmita is looking for excuses not to go back home when Luigi offers to take her. Omar tells Fernando he's uneasy about Lety's disappearance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 170

episodes.synopsis: Luigi asks Irmita to tell him about her life with Rafael. Carolina gets mad at Lety when she tells her she wants to go back to Mexico City.
episodes.title: Capítulo 171

episodes.synopsis: Fernando visits Lety's office, feeling sad. Julieta tells Fernando she doesn't know where Lety is. Aldo tells Lety he sees in her a troubled soul.
episodes.title: Capítulo 172

episodes.synopsis: Irmita tells her workmates that the doctor says Rafael could die at any time. Lety tells Carolina she told her life's story to the man she met.
episodes.title: Capítulo 173

episodes.synopsis: Aldo tells Carolina he's impressed with Lety. Marcia gets mad when she finds out Lety left town. She's surprised when Fernando admits he loves Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 174

episodes.synopsis: Lety asks Aldo to teach her to fish. Fernando gets mad at Omar for calling Lety names. Lety coaches the Nuestra Belleza contestants for their quiz.
episodes.title: Capítulo 175

episodes.synopsis: The Nuestra Belleza contestants thank Lety for lending them confidence. Aldo arrives and congratulates her for sharing what she learned with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 176

episodes.synopsis: Carolina takes Lety to the beauty salon. Tomas refuses to tell Julieta why Lety agreed to found Filmo Imagen and put an attachment on Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 177

episodes.synopsis: Aldo tells Lety his father got mad because he wanted to be a chef instead of an engineer. Lety says she admires him for staying true to his ideals.
episodes.title: Capítulo 178

episodes.synopsis: Fernando shouts out, calling for Lety. Lety tells Aldo she can't stop thinking about Fernando. She tries to leave but changes her mind.
episodes.title: Capítulo 179

episodes.synopsis: Aldo takes Lety sailing. Irmita takes her family to visit Conceptos. Rebeca asks Luigi to help her with the paperwork for Irmita's retirement.
episodes.title: Capítulo 180

episodes.synopsis: Monica tells Marcia she saw Fernando at a bar and the bartender called him a taxi because he was so drunk. She tells Teresita, who is upset by it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 181

episodes.synopsis: Jessica tells Carolina that thanks to Lety's attitude and advice, she's not afraid anymore. Aldo takes Lety by motorcycle to see Port of Acapulco.
episodes.title: Capítulo 182

episodes.synopsis: Fernando teases Alicia for the relationship she had with Tomas. Teresita proposes to Marcia that the two of them make Conceptos a success.
episodes.title: Capítulo 183

episodes.synopsis: Simon tells Teresita and Marcia Fernando left the company in bad shape. Fernando parks in front of Aldo's boat on an Acapulco beach.
episodes.title: Capítulo 184

episodes.synopsis: Fernando, battered and beaten, is removed from the bar again. Lety breaks up a fight between Aldo and Fausto. Fausto gives Aldo a letter.
episodes.title: Capítulo 185

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Carolina she's been with Aldo until dawn and kissed him, so she can never see him again. Carolina says she should give him a chance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 186

episodes.synopsis: Aldo cooks for the Nuestra Belleza contestants and asks Lety to help him. Lety asks Aldo not to talk about their kiss, and won't let him kiss her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 187

episodes.synopsis: Omar and Fernando call the Padilla household, but Julieta hangs up on them. The club girls, Paco, Celso, Simon, and Raul watch the pageant on TV.
episodes.title: Capítulo 188

episodes.synopsis: Fernando arrives at Jorge Flores's house. He gives him a potion to help him get over his woes and become a more harmonious version of his former self.
episodes.title: Capítulo 189

episodes.synopsis: At the board meeting, Don Humberto says he reached an agreement with Don Erasmo. At home, Don Erasmo agrees to let Tomas stay and eat with them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 190

episodes.synopsis: Sara flirts with Mr. Sanchez and Mr. Rosales. Don Erasmo tells Julieta and Tomas about the agreement he reached with Don Humberto.
episodes.title: Capítulo 191

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Tomas she doesn't hate Fernando and she's forgiven him. Mr. Santa Maria tells the board what to do to save Conceptos, but they need Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 192

episodes.synopsis: Marcia apologizes to Fernando and promises not to bother him about Lety. Lety teaches Tomas what she learned from Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 193

episodes.synopsis: Celso won't let Lety into Conceptos. Paula Maria gets mad when she finds out Simon took Alicia home on his motorcycle. Lola refuses to forgive Efren.
episodes.title: Capítulo 194

episodes.synopsis: Teresita asks Marcia to come to the board room. Alicia advises he to take Lety down. The club girls comment on Marcia's reaction when she sees Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 195

episodes.synopsis: Aldo sees Lety get on a bus, and to her surprise, he gets on too. At a restaurant and bar, Fernando runs into Jorge Flores and fills him in.
episodes.title: Capítulo 196

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Sanchez agrees to help with Lola's divorce. Alicia flirts with Mr. Santa Maria, but he won't agree to date her because Mr. Rosales wants to.
episodes.title: Capítulo 197

episodes.synopsis: Omar advises Fernando to seduce Lety again so she'll save them from losing everything. Lety asks Marcia to make her role at Conceptos very clear.
episodes.title: Capítulo 198

episodes.synopsis: Luigi tells Carolina and Aldo why Don Humberto made Lety president of Conceptos. Lety tells Tomas she named him Conceptos's vice president of finance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 199

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Simon arrive at the disco bar for some fun with the club girls. Simon comes in looking for Paula Maria. Fernando sees Lety with a man.
episodes.title: Capítulo 200

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Tomas she told the club girls they're not together anymore. At the trial, the judge gives Conceptos six months to pay off their debt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 201

episodes.synopsis: Luigi introduces Aldo to Marcia and says they'll be working together, but on a project not related to Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 202

episodes.synopsis: Raul places Tomas in Olarte's former office. Tomas sees Alicia talking with Aldo and things he likes her. Lety takes Fernando's office.
episodes.title: Capítulo 203

episodes.synopsis: Lety asks Alicia over the intercom to tell Marcia to come to the conference room immediately. Marcia reproaches Lety for what Alicia said to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 204

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Luigi to go to the meeting. Lety relays the judge's decision, and proposes a project she and Aldo worked out to comply with court orders.
episodes.title: Capítulo 205

episodes.synopsis: During the meeting, Luigi announces that he will resign from Conceptos after the culinary fair inauguration, and says Yazmin should take his place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 206

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Marcia she's not happy about being her secretary, but when she asks for her resignation Alicia takes it back. Aldo gets to know Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 207

episodes.synopsis: Lety introduces Tomas to Aldo. Aldo and Carolina agree to go out to eat. Tomas tells Lety he doesn't like Aldo because he and Alicia like each other.
episodes.title: Capítulo 208

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Alicia Fernando backed Lety up during the meeting, so they must be together. Lety tells Tomas she can't throw away Fernando's gifts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 209

episodes.synopsis: Aldo tells Carolina the gift he bought Lety wasn't meant to seduce her, it's just an office decoration. She says he'll have her because he loves her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 210

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Aldo she doesn't want to talk about Fernando because she doesn't want to remember the pain he caused her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 211

episodes.synopsis: Simon tells Paula Maria that until she can prove nothing was going on between her and the person she was dancing with, their relationship is stuck.
episodes.title: Capítulo 212

episodes.synopsis: Aldo tells Ariel why he chose Conceptos for the promotion. Ariel notices Fernando smells. Fernando tells Omar what he was looking for in the trash.
episodes.title: Capítulo 213

episodes.synopsis: Ariel insults Alicia and Tomas defends her. The club girls ask Sara to agree to go out with Mr. Sanchez for Lola's sake, and she accepts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 214

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Sanchez asks Sara to dance, but despite Lola's insistence, she refuses. Irmita dances with him. Alicia is convinced Aldo wants to upset her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 215

episodes.synopsis: In the park, Lety tells Aldo she dreamed about Fernando. Aldo realizes he lost the pearl. Don Erasmo is mad at Lety for going out all the time.
episodes.title: Capítulo 216

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Omar mock Aldo's exhibit. Fernando and Aldo convince the managers to accept the project. The club girls show Lety a letter they found.
episodes.title: Capítulo 217

episodes.synopsis: Alicia makes fun of Tomas. Aldo sees him and says Tomas wants to look like him. Tomas thanks Aldo for saving him again and asks him to be his friend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 218

episodes.synopsis: Guillermo arrives at Conceptos and gets mad when they hang up the phone without taking a message. Simon convinces Alicia to open his personal mail.
episodes.title: Capítulo 219

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Omar he's leaving because he has to get his life together and get away from the pain he feels when he sees Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 220

episodes.synopsis: Marcia is upset to find out the club girls will eat with Lety in the conference room. The club girls see Paula Maria throw a photo of Lety and Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 221

episodes.synopsis: Alicia tells Tomas they cut her cell phone service, and he loans her his. Tomas, looking for a fight, calls Tomas a traitor for marrying Alicia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 222

episodes.synopsis: Lety leaves Fernando and Aldo fighting over Lety's love, and Marcia separates them. Lety thinks Tomas fought for her, and Fernando for Conceptos.
episodes.title: Capítulo 223

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Tomas Ariel is challenging her to prove she's capable of being president of Conceptos. Fernando finds out where Lety's meeting with Ariel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 224

episodes.synopsis: Alicia lays down with the wedding dress on and says she's waiting for her dream of marrying Aldo to come true. Lety writes about Aldo in her diary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 225

episodes.synopsis: Tomas asks Alicia to forget what he said about Aldo loving Lety, he was just jealous. Lety and Paula Maria find Omar hiding in Don Erasmo's office.
episodes.title: Capítulo 226

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Aldo to send a photo to Lety. Aldo tells Lety he'll ask Julieta to make salsa for the event's inauguration banquet.
episodes.title: Capítulo 227

episodes.synopsis: The club girls don't believe the motives Lety gives for Aldo and Fernando's fight. Aldo and Omar switch cell phones at the restaurant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 228

episodes.synopsis: Aldo tells Tomas he can't go without saying goodbye to Lety and that Omar didn't give him the contract to sign.
episodes.title: Capítulo 229

episodes.synopsis: Aldo convinces Don Erasmo to let Lety spend the night with him at San Miguel Regla. Fernando spies on them and tells Omar what he sees over the phone.
episodes.title: Capítulo 230

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Karla about his life with Marcia and his love for Lety, and she invites him into her hotel room. She finds him crying over Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 231

episodes.synopsis: At San Miguel Regla, Aldo shows Lety a waterfall. Omar spies on them. Karla tells Fernando how he can let go of Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 232

episodes.synopsis: Tomas gives Alicia the check and asks for a kiss, but she refuses. Karla says Fernando should make Lety jealous. Alicia has the office redecorated.
episodes.title: Capítulo 233

episodes.synopsis: Lety is upset when she sees Tomas arrive in Alicia's old car. Tomas says he bought it for himself.
episodes.title: Capítulo 234

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo tells Aldo he wants to write his uncle Lazaro's biography. Fernando tells Lety the culinary tourism campaign in the U.S. is ready.
episodes.title: Capítulo 235

episodes.synopsis: Fernando realizes Alicia is spying too, and he reprimands her and takes her to Karla. Karla and Fernando think Marcia sent Alicia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 236

episodes.synopsis: The club girls trick Alicia into staying until the executive meeting is adjounred while they go rehearse their Secretary Day show.
episodes.title: Capítulo 237

episodes.synopsis: Alicia is told that Marcia left the hotel. Aldo convinces Luigi to give the club girls a makeover for the event. Fernando introduces Karla to Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 238

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Omar hear Luigi change the delivery address for the books. Aldo hears someone changed the address, and he and Lety think it was Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 239

episodes.synopsis: Alicia agrees to go with Marcia. Luigi explains to Fernando why he changed the address for the books. Aldo is photographed kissing Lety on the cheek.
episodes.title: Capítulo 240

episodes.synopsis: Luigi presents the commercials he made. He says goodbye to the dancers and asks Irmita to take him to the club girls.
episodes.title: Capítulo 241

episodes.synopsis: The club girls congratulate Aldo and Lety, and want to see them kiss, when Fernando and Karla walk in. Alicia and Marcia congratulate Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 242

episodes.synopsis: Luigi tells Aldo he's with Ruli, and apologizes for what he did the night before. He offers to keep working together. Aldo gives Lety a heart charm.
episodes.title: Capítulo 243

episodes.synopsis: Lety asks Marcia not to talk about Fernando anymore. Marcia is surprised to see Lety and Karla getting along.
episodes.title: Capítulo 244

episodes.synopsis: Fernando hears the club girls say they'll help get Lety to fall in love with Aldo. Fernando goes snooping in Lety's place and finds her diary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 245

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells the club girls she'll accept Aldo's proposal. Fernando tells Omar reading Lety's diary made him realize how much he hurt her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 246

episodes.synopsis: Fernando confesses to Julieta his love for Lety and begs her to listen. At El Rincon Italiano restaurant, Juan Jose Ulloa performs with Tiziano Ferro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 247

episodes.synopsis: Alicia is driving Tomas's car, and he's running behind. She refuses to kiss him or invite him in. He takes the keys. Alicia finds an eviction notice.
episodes.title: Capítulo 248

episodes.synopsis: Fernando confesses to Teresita that he loves Lety and says she doesn't trust him. Lety tells Carolina she can't leave Conceptos and make Aldo suffer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 249

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Lety go out in his car. Simon tells the club girls what Fernando and Lety did. Despite Alicia's plans, Lety won't resign.
episodes.title: Capítulo 250

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Julieta she agreed to marry Fernando. He tells Don Humberto Lety agreed to marry him. The judge accepts Aldo's paying off Conceptos's debt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 251

episodes.synopsis: Tomas tells Fernando Conceptos belongs to Aldo. Fernando asks him to ask what Aldo wants. Omar refuses to speak with Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 252

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Julieta he feels like he's lost Lety. The owner of El Sabor de la Vida restaurant welcomes Aldo, and he presents his dish to Leticia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 253

episodes.synopsis: At Conceptos, Tomas tells Fernando Aldo stayed to make informed decisions. Omar shows the paper to the girls and says the girl in the photo is Aurora.
episodes.title: Capítulo 254

episodes.synopsis: Carolina asks where Omar's date with Aurora will be. Ariel fires Alicia for incompetence. Lety refuses to talk about personal affairs with Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 255

episodes.synopsis: Don Erasmo reprimands Aurora for going out alone, the way she's dressed, and where she goes. Tomas finds out Alicia was evicted from her apartment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 256

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Aldo tell Lety they want to team up to keep Ariel in check. The girls vote on whether Lety should stay with Fernando or Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 257

episodes.synopsis: Lety shows Don Erasmo she isn't a little girl anymore. The girls are happy to see Marcia's change of attitude. Tomas asks Aldo for advice with Alicia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 258

episodes.synopsis: At a restaurant, Fernando tells Humberto how he realized he loves Lety. Lety asks Aldo to be patient about Fernando being around her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 259

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Aldo he doesn't believe him. Alicia tells Tomas he'll lose her if he doesn't pay attention to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 260

episodes.synopsis: Omar has a date with a mystery woman. Lety tells Aldo she feels bad for Fernando. Carolina tells Luigi they're going to play a prank on Omar.
episodes.title: Capítulo 261

episodes.synopsis: Ernesto introduces Omar to a reporter, and he invites him on his date with Aurora. Sara, Lola, and Martha set out to find the mystery woman.
episodes.title: Capítulo 262

episodes.synopsis: While she's with Aldo, Lety answers the phone and then hangs up, then shuts off her cell phone. Omar tells Fernando Aurora convinced him to help him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 263

episodes.synopsis: Martha shows up at Lety's house with a bag full of tarts and offers one to Erasmo. Alicia reproaches Tomas for offering the apartment to Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 264

episodes.synopsis: Fernando is offered a job. Alicia tells Tomas she's angry and demands he buy her a dress. Fernando tells Julieta he hasn't been seeing Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 265

episodes.synopsis: Luigi asks Claudio to teach him about retro mod. Lety invites the club girls to her house. Luigi sees a photo of Aurora and thinks she's a diva.
episodes.title: Capítulo 266

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Jacks gives Conceptos a deadline to acquire Aurora. Lety is against hiring her. Aldo thinks she doesn't want to get rid of Conceptos's debt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 267

episodes.synopsis: Lety leaves in her car and Tomas follows her in a taxi. Alicia tells the club girls she's done with Tomas. Aurora admits to Tomas she's Lety.
episodes.title: Capítulo 268

episodes.synopsis: Marcia demands Luigi help Omar, but he says he deceived him. Tomas asks Alicia to talk with her father. Lety asks Tomas to help her talk to Mr. Jacks.
episodes.title: Capítulo 269

episodes.synopsis: Lety leaves in a hurry. Tomas invites Celso and Simon to his farewell party. Tomas tells Lety Mr. Jacks won't back off and asks her to dress up.
episodes.title: Capítulo 270

episodes.synopsis: Carmina introduces Esther to Aldo. Lety comes out of the bathroom transformed into Aurora. Omar sees her and tells her he loves her. She leaves him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 271

episodes.synopsis: Marcia tells Omar and Fernando she's coming to live with them. Tomas and Alicia discuss the wedding. Lety and Aldo say they'll always love each other.
episodes.title: Capítulo 272

episodes.synopsis: On the Televisa set, Juan Jose Origel welcomes the club girls, who tell him they know about the mystery woman and demand the prize for finding her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 273

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Lety leave in a hurry. The club girls argue over the prizes they'll receive, and Aldo calms them down. Omar asks for Aurora.
episodes.title: Capítulo 274

episodes.synopsis: Marcia cries, remembering what happened at her wedding. Alicia, drunk, dances with the girls. Lety catches the bouquet, Fernando catches the garter.
episodes.title: Capítulo 275

episodes.synopsis: Aldo gives Carmina and Esther instructions on how he wants his book to be written. Lety tells Fernando he inspired her to make Conceptos a success.
episodes.title: Capítulo 276

episodes.synopsis: Luigi tells Marcia the script is better with Fernando's changes. Luigi records the pilot, and Fernando and Aldo congratulate his work.
episodes.title: Capítulo 277

episodes.synopsis: Fernando asks Lety to talk to Carolina to find Aurora, who he thinks is pretty and he can make a new life with her. Lety doesn't like the idea.
episodes.title: Capítulo 278

episodes.synopsis: Fernando tells Marcia he found out Lety made Aurora jealous. Alicia makes Tomas sleep in the living room of the apartment he rented.
episodes.title: Capítulo 279

episodes.synopsis: Aurora asks for a new contract and a new pen. The girls hear Aldo tell Fernando he respects him. Aurora makes it clear to Omar she doesn't want him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 280

episodes.synopsis: Fernando realizes there's no one at Lety's house. Tomas is surprised when Alicia receives a new TV and says her dad gave it to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 281

episodes.synopsis: Omar is singing with joy. Lety arrives at Conceptos dressed as Aurora, Omar arrives and greets her indifferently.
episodes.title: Capítulo 282

episodes.synopsis: Fernando kisses Aurora still hiding the love he feels for Lety. Lety says she can't betray Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 283

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Aldo she loves him. Omar buys Carolina a necklace. Omar tells Carolina he wants to revive what they shared the night they spent together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 284

episodes.synopsis: Fernando reproaches Aldo and Lety for only caring about their wedding and not about Aurora. Aldo reproaches him back for only caring about money.
episodes.title: Capítulo 285

episodes.synopsis: Aldo asks Lety to accompany him to see the yacht with Carmina. Martha joins a compulsive eaters support group.
episodes.title: Capítulo 286

episodes.synopsis: Lety tells Aldo she can't go see the yacht with him, he thinks she's showing little interest in the wedding. Tomas tells Lety what Julieta told Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 287

episodes.synopsis: Fernando promises Julieta he won't tell Lety he knows her secret identity. Lety comes in upset, blaming them for plotting to separate her and Aldo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 288

episodes.synopsis: Simon shows off his IT specialist certificate to the girls. From outside her house, Omar hears Carolina talking with a man and assumes the worst.
episodes.title: Capítulo 289

episodes.synopsis: Paula Maria accepts Simon and he faints. Paula Maria receives a phone call from Jaimito's father. Mr. Jacques apologizes to Lety and Fernando.
episodes.title: Capítulo 290

episodes.synopsis: At Conceptos, Fernando hears Julieta tell Tomas that Lety should marry Fernando instead of Aldo. Fernando tells Julieta Aldo isn't unfaithful.
episodes.title: Capítulo 291

episodes.synopsis: By phone, Lety, in her Aurora voice, agrees to film the TV series with Fernando. The neighborhood is decorated for Simon and Paula Maria's wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 292

episodes.synopsis: Tomas gives Simon and Paula Maria plane tickets and a room in Acapulco. Efren is taken by the police for not paying alimony.
episodes.title: Capítulo 293

episodes.synopsis: Aldo reproaches Lety for tricking Fernando. Lety tells him why she becamse Aurora. He says she'll never stop loving Fernando. Efren is released.
episodes.title: Capítulo 294

episodes.synopsis: At Conceptos, Lety and Fernando are congratulated on the release of the pilot. Jacques apologizes to Lety and gives her her first payment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 295

episodes.synopsis: In Acapulco, Fernando asks Aldo to talk about Lety. The girls are amazed when they see Lety. Fernando tells Aldo the reasons Lety became Aurora.
episodes.title: Capítulo 296

episodes.synopsis: Lety dreams that on her wedding day Don Erasmo tells her he's to blame for her growing up overprotected and afraid, and Fernando stops the wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 297

episodes.synopsis: Lety helps Tomas run from the police. Alicia returns the money to Conceptos's account. Tomas, dressed as a woman, and Lety leave in her car.
episodes.title: Capítulo 298

episodes.synopsis: Captain Ortiz tells Fernando over the loudspeaker on Martha's behalf that Lety won't marry Aldo because he's the one she loves.
episodes.title: Capítulo 299

episodes.synopsis: Fernando and Lety arrive at her house, and he asks Don Erasmo's consent to marry his daughter. The series ends with a wedding and a song.
episodes.title: Capítulo 300
